text:
On OSX 10.15.7 I have problems with any package that evokes the FFMPEG.jl, e.g. making a recording w/ Javis.jl or Makie.jl. Any thoughts?
```record(figure, "f16.mkv", 1:100; framerate = 10) do trans
           GLMakie.translate!(obj, trans)
       end
dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libbz2.1.0.6.dylib
  Referenced from: /Users/me/.julia/artifacts/c28cdc80b48b1077c8fc57d8e94e6eb9c1a4a776/bin/ffmpeg
  Reason: Incompatible library version: ffmpeg requires version 1.0.0 or later, but libbz2.1.0.6.dylib provides version 0.0.0
ERROR: LoadError: IOError: write: broken pipe (EPIPE)```
If I `./ ffmpeg`  or the artifact directly I get
```dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libass.9.dylib
  Referenced from: /Users/me/.julia/artifacts/c28cdc80b48b1077c8fc57d8e94e6eb9c1a4a776/bin/./ffmpeg
  Reason: image not found```

       end

ERROR: LoadError: IOError: write: broken pipe (EPIPE)
or the artifact directly I get

  Referenced from: /Users/me/.julia/artifacts/c28cdc80b48b1077c8fc57d8e94e6eb9c1a4a776/bin/./ffmpeg
  Reason: image not found

text: Not an answer <@UP95S4864>, but perhaps ask also in <#CB1R90P8R|image-processing> and/or <#CFLGP7EQ7|video>. If you run into more issues with Javis, let me know.  :load:

elements.text: . If you run into more issues with Javis, let me know.

text: Thanks <@US64J0NPQ>. My problem is definitely upstream of Javis

elements.text: . My problem is definitely upstream of Javis

text:
<@UP95S4864> can you please show the output of
```using Libdl
filter!(lib -> occursin("bz2", lib), dllist())```
after you get the error?

elements.text: can you please show the output of

using Libdl
filter!(lib -> occursin("bz2", lib), dllist())

text: so system libbz2 is being pulled by something, it shouldn't.  does the error happen also in a fresh julia session?

elements.text: so system libbz2 is being pulled by something, it shouldn't.  does the error happen also in a fresh julia session?

text:
In a fresh session:
```using Libdl
filter!(lib -> occursin("bz2", lib), dllist())

using GLMakie
fig = GLMakie.Figure()
record(fig, "mygif.gif", 1:100;) do i
    GLMakie.scatter(rand(5),rand(5))
end

filter!(lib -> occursin("bz2", lib), dllist())```
```1-element Vector{String}:
 "/usr/lib/libbz2.1.0.dylib"

dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libbz2.1.0.6.dylib
